author: Mina Chong
title: 2020w1-mt2 question about problem description
question:
Hello, I was working through problem 3 where we are to complete the function design with the following purpose:
;; produce true if list is a descending sequence starting at n, ending at 1
I submitted the following test for which I received the autograder feedback below:
(check-expect (descending-from-n? empty 0) false)

Test validity (matches problem statement):             test number 1 invalid.
I'm confused why this would be, since an empty list is not starting at 0 and there is nothing I've identified in the problem description as saying the given natural has to be greater than 0. Am I missing something else?
Thanks!
instructor_answer:
In our interpretation of that problem the recursion looks like:
(list 3 2 1)   3
(list   2 1)   2
(list     1)   2
(list      )   0
so we produce empty for the case you mention
